plugin.name: Shanty
plugin.author: BlueFeather
plugin.description: Contains a collection of sea shanties to make your puping sessions bearable - either by outputting to room channel (say) or to area channel (yell).

plugin.name: Spellup
plugin.author: BlueFeather
plugin.description: Tries to keep you spelled up while honoring different states (afk, sleeping, resting, combat, note).

plugin.name: MiniEpics
plugin.author: BlueFeather
plugin.description: A collection of triggers for use in Titan and Terra miniepics - to make life there easier.
